news.title: 'I'm angry. It's not right' - locals want asylum hotels shut, but are shared houses the answer?
news.summary: The BBC's UK editor, Ed Thomas, meets local people and asylum seekers in two towns in north-west England.

news.title: Best and worst-performing NHS hospital trusts in England named
news.summary: The new league tables score trusts on measures including finances and patient access to care.

news.title: US lawmakers release Epstein 'birthday book' with alleged Trump note
news.summary: The White House says the president did not draw the picture or sign the note, after it was published on Monday.

news.title: Mandelson called Epstein 'best pal' in birthday message
news.summary: The description is contained an alleged 50th "birthday book" given to the disgraced financier that has been released by US lawmakers.

news.title: Bridget Phillipson and Emily Thornberry join Labour deputy leader race
news.summary: Hopefuls have until the end of Thursday to secure enough backing from Labour MPs to take part.

news.title: Mystery donor offers £100k to find student who went missing after house party
news.summary: Mother of Jack O’Sullivan, who disappeared in Bristol in March 2024, says she is "overcome" by the offer.

news.title: 'No one is irreplaceable', says BBC chief after scandals
news.summary: Tim Davie tells MPs he is "not letting anything lie" when it comes to rooting out abuses of power.

news.title: Twenty dead in attack on Ukrainians collecting pensions, Zelensky says
news.summary: The air strike targeted the eastern village of Yarova, officials say, a few kilometres from the front line.

news.title: Anastacia: Arnold Schwarzenegger made me sing Whatta Man 12 times
news.summary: As she celebrates 25 years in music, Anastacia reflects on the gigs she played on her way to the top.

news.title: Who could replace Angela Rayner as Labour deputy leader?
news.summary: The winning candidate - voted for by Labour members - will be announced on 25 October.
